body: so I have been banned from Avicus for around 10 months now. But im back! A special thanks to izjust4fun for un denying me. And on another note: Holy geez the server has changed a lot in these months. New hub, custom maps, more employees, new faces, and best of all.. Old friends.

title: I'm baaack :)

replies.body: Welcome back! Hope you have fun on the server if you have any questions contact me or any other staff! :D

replies.body: Welcome back to Avicus! If you would like to know more about the changes made to the server while you were gone or have any questions/concerns, feel free to ask me or any staff member! Enjoy your stay :)
